Author: OctupleJeans724
Description:
I was annoyed at constantly drawing Romans in the 1.6 test2 version of the mod, so I added them to the game.

I'm not the original modder, nor am I the guy that took over and made 1.6. If you are either of those guys, and have suggestions on how to improve this, let's talk.
Title: 10x Civ shared 1.7-The Hex Edit
